algorithms.name: processing vibration patterns
algorithms.html:
The rules for <dfn id="dfn-processing-vibration-patterns" tabindex="0" aria-haspopup="dialog" data-dfn-type="dfn">processing vibration patterns</dfn> are as given in
        the following algorithm:

steps.html: Let pattern be the first method argument of the vibrate() method.
Let valid pattern be the result of passing pattern to validate and normalize.
If the result of running the steps to determine the visibility state [PAGE-VISIBILITY-2] is not visible, then return false and terminate these steps.
Perform vibration with this's relevant global object and valid pattern.

algorithms.name: validate and normalize
algorithms.html: To validate and normalize a vibration pattern given pattern, run these steps:

steps.html:
If <var>pattern</var> is a list, proceed to the next step.
        Otherwise run the following substeps:

Let <var>list</var> be an initially empty list, and add
            <var>pattern</var> to <var>list</var>.
Set <var>pattern</var> to <var>list</var>.

Let <var>max length</var> be an implementation-dependent maximum
        length of <var>pattern</var>.

If the length of <var>pattern</var> is greater than <var>max
        length</var>, truncate <var>pattern</var>, leaving only the first <var>
          max length</var> entries.

Let <var>max duration</var> be an implementation-dependent maximum
        duration for a single vibration entry in a <var>pattern</var>.

For each entry in <var>pattern</var> whose value is greater than
        <var>max duration</var>, set the entry's value to <var>max
        duration</var>.
Return <var>pattern</var>.

algorithms.name: perform vibration
algorithms.html: To perform vibration using a global object global and a vibration pattern pattern, run these steps:

steps.html: If global does not have sticky activation, return false and terminate these steps.
An implementation MAY return false and terminate these steps.
If another instance of the perform vibration algorithm is already running, run the following substeps:
Abort that other instance of the perform vibration algorithm, if any.

If <var>pattern</var> is an empty list, contains a single entry
            with a value of 0, or if the device is unable to vibrate, then
            return true and terminate these steps.
Return true, and then continue running these steps asynchronously.

For each <var>time</var> in <var>pattern</var>, run the following
        substeps:

If the index of <var>time</var> is even (the first entry has
            index 0), vibrate the device for <var>time</var> milliseconds.
Otherwise wait for <var>time</var> milliseconds.
